main_desc.message:
A small open-source plugin.
It allows for quick searching of bookmarks and history.
It can conveniently manage browsing history and block some useless records on the search page.

msg_more.message: More records are not shown. Please narrow down the search range.

msg_processing.message: Processing. Please do not close the page.

ui_search_placehold.message: Enter keywords (Enter for local search only, Alt + Enter to jump to Google search)

ui_setting_authorization_history.message: Replace the browser's history management tab?

ui_setting_general_maxsize.message: Maximum number of search results to display.

ui_setting_sites_tips.message:
* Manage the websites you have remarked here.
* Display the date when you first recorded the website.
* The deletion function here does not delete the browser's history, but deletes the record item.

ui_setting_about_content.message:
An open-source, free, and useful Chrome plugin.
	Source code: https://github.com/lalinking/webdiary
